derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Old French doulcemer, probably from Latin dulce melos 'sweet melody'

means.word_mean: 1. a stringed instrument used in American folk music; an elliptical body and a fretted fingerboard and three strings
2. a trapezoidal zither whose metal strings are struck with light hammers
